ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL( Walkin_Source__c , 'Corporate(Unregistered)') , ISBLANK( Name_of_Unregistered_Corporate__c ) , $Label.Disable_all_validations_from_opp == "false" /*Added by Prashant to control disabling all validations together*/)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please fill the name of the unregistered corporate(walk-in).
